field.name: Virtual_Performance
field.description: Used to generate artificial results, similar field in vehicle

field.name: wet_weather_ability
field.description: Driver skill level for handling wet conditions expressed as a percentage.

field.name: bhp
field.description: The amount of change to the engine output

field.name: positive_chance
field.description: a percentage chance that the change will be positive

field.name: trigger_chance
field.description: a percentage chance that the change will happen

field.description: The amount of change to the engine output

field.name: duration
field.description: The number of race weekends this occurs over

field.name: tier

field.name: trigger_change
field.description: The percentage change that the performance variation will be applied

field.name: clear_state_ratio
field.description: The ratio, percentage, of a clear state.

field.name: dry_time
field.description: The time, in seconds, required to dry the track when there is no cloud at all.

field.name: heavy_rain_state_ratio
field.description: The ratio, percentage, of a heavy rain state.

field.name: ID
field.description: Automaticaly generated identifier.

field.name: light_cloud_state_ratio
field.description: The ratio, percentage, of a light cloud state.

field.name: light_rain_state_ratio
field.description: The ratio, percentage, of a light rain state.

field.name: max_humidity
field.description: The maximum absolute humidity.

field.name: max_state_duration
field.description: The maximum time a state lasts in minutes.

field.name: max_temp
field.description: The maximum temperature in celcius.

field.name: max_transition_duration
field.description: The maximum time taken to change state in minutes.

field.name: max_wind_speed
field.description: The maximum wind speed in m/s.

field.name: min_humidity
field.description: The minumum absolute humidity.

field.name: min_state_duration
field.description: The minimum time a state lasts in minutes.

field.name: min_transition_duration
field.description: The minimum time taken to change state in minutes.

field.name: min_wind_speed
field.description: The minimum wind speed in m/s.

field.name: overcast_state_ratio
field.description: The ratio, percentage, of a overcast state.

field.name: soak_time
field.description: The time, in seconds, required to soak the track at full rain intensity.

field.name: track
field.description: Track ID, referenced from track table.

field.name: audio_key_driver_number
field.description: Not sure what this is for, see NOTE1 in rd_audio_game_interface.cpp (AJG: used in the speech system to identify which driver the race engineer is talking about)

field.name: car_number
field.description: driver number as used in the driver selection screens

field.name: driver_voice
field.description: See NOTE2 in rd_audio_game_interface.cpp

field.name: fake_qualifying_ability
field.description: Will be used to generate grid [ositions for race only events

field.name: favourite_track
field.description: Stats boost will be applied to this driver if it is their favourite track

field.name: file_name
field.description: File name safe version of the drivers name

field.name: pit_speech_filename
field.description: The filename for the pit speech for this driver (if any)

field.name: stat_previous_year_standing
field.description: Based on car numbers for the start of the current season

field.name: stats_grand_prix
field.description: number of grand prix the driver has participated in

field.description: REMOVED FOR 2012

field.name: stats_highest_grid_pos_count
field.description: REMOVED FOR 2012

field.description: REMOVED FOR 2012

field.description: number of 3rds, 2nds or 1sts achieved

field.name: stats_points
field.description: REMOVED FOR 2012

field.name: stats_pole_positions
field.description: Number of times the driver has started in pole position

field.name: stats_wins
field.description: number of race wins

field.name: stats_world_championships
field.description: number of world championship wins

field.name: default_grid_position
field.description: Default grid position, currently used for GP mode

field.name: firstdriver
field.description: If yes then this is the first driver for the team, otherwise the second driver

field.name: livery
field.description: The livery for this driver on this team this year

field.name: season
field.description: The year this pairing existed in

field.name: base_objective
field.description: Position in which teams expect drivers to finish. 0 is first. First drivers will be asked to finish 1 place above this

field.name: billboard_texture_id
field.description: Texture ID used for the billboards

field.name: boss_firstname
field.description: Team Principal First Name

field.name: boss_surname
field.description: Team Principal Surname

field.name: engine_power
field.description: in bhp

field.name: engine_string
field.description: Specified the language data string to use for this teams engine

field.name: file_string_id
field.description: the filename of team-related paddock objects

field.name: front_tyre_wear
field.description: Tyre wear modifier. 0.95=5% reduced wear, 1.05 = 5% more wear, 1.0=normal wear

field.name: garage_id
field.description: Position of garage box in pits

field.name: has_kers
field.description: Specifies wether a team has KERS by default

field.name: pitstop_highest_range
field.description: Worst case pitstop time offset

field.name: pitstop_lowest_range
field.description: Best case pitstop time offset

field.name: prestige
field.description: How desirable a team is to race with. Used when assigning cars to player in the MP game

field.name: rear_tyre_wear
field.description: Tyre wear modifier. 0.95=5% reduced wear, 1.05 = 5% more wear, 1.0=normal wear

field.name: short_name
field.description: 3-letter team name

field.name: sponsor_index
field.description: Index into the sponsor system to determine textures (which needs a single character)

field.name: stat_championship_wins
field.description: Number of championship wins the team has had

field.name: stat_constructor_wins
field.description: Number of constructor championships the team has won

field.name: stat_team_boss
field.description: Team Principal

field.name: tier
field.description: This teams tier, there are five tiers, the 'better' teams are in tier 1, the 'worst' in 5

field.description: scales virtual session times by this value

field.name: vent
field.description: Either 0 (no vent), 0.5 (clear vent), or 1 (vent)

field.name: wing
field.description: Either 0 (no wing), 0.5 (clear wing), or 1 (wing)

field.name: enum_value
field.description: the value of the preset in the neRacing::WeatherSettingsPresets:Type enumerator

field.description: human-friendly name of the weather preset

field.name: points
field.description: Value(s) to be read. This can be a comma seperated list of values.

field.description: The XP awarded

field.name: upper_bound
field.description: Upper bound of the level range

field.name: colour
field.description: The colour of the box in the design doc for questions of this type

field.description: Description in the design doc's positive outcome column

field.description: Who this question predominantly affects

field.description: rear ride height

field.description: The background texture displayed on the frontend screen

field.description: Minimum time required for a bronze medal (in microseconds)

field.name: gold_time
field.description: Minimum time required for a gold medal (in microseconds)

field.description: The leaderboard lookup id, corresponds to the friendly name of a leaderboard in the LIVE game configuration file.

field.name: silver_time
field.description: Minimum time required for a silver medal (in microseconds)

field.name: sort_order
field.description: determines the position of this scenario in the frontend's scenario select list

field.name: team_id
field.description: The team the player will be driving for

field.name: track_model_id
field.description: The track this scenario will use

field.name: weather_id
field.description: the weather preset used in the scenario

field.name: calender_glyph
field.description: glyph path on race calender asset

field.name: distance_to_first_corner
field.description: in metres

field.name: drs_double_detection
field.description: Does this track have 2 dections zone for drs or just one?

field.name: gp_mode_round_number

field.name: leaderboard_id
field.description: The leaderboard id used to map between the track and the leaderboard's name

field.name: location
field.description: Location of the circuit

field.description: Long event name, 2012 FORMULA 1 QANTAS AUSTRALIAN GRAND PRIX etc

field.name: max_safety_car

field.description: Event, AUSTRALIAN GRAND PRIX etc

field.name: num_laps

field.description: The number of corners/turns to be displayed as a stat about the track

field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a practice session

field.description: False is exit garage turn right, true is exit garage turn left

field.description: Pit speed limit in practice and qualifying sessions.

field.description: Pit speed limit in race session.

field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a qualifying session

field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a qualifying session

field.name: q3_grip
field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a qualifying session

field.name: race_grip
field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a race session

field.name: safety_car_chance
field.description: Zero to 1 chance of the safety car coming out when an icident occurs. 0 = never come out, 1 = always come out

field.name: short_event_name
field.description: Country, Australia etc

field.name: short_track_name
field.description: Melbourne etc

field.name: show_in_track_select_menu
field.description: This route will be available in the track selection menu if this box is ticked

field.name: skipfe_track
field.description: Whether this is the track used by skipfe career

field.name: stat_average_lap_time
field.description: Track select screen statistic - Time taken to complete a flying lap on average

field.name: stat_brake_wear_level
field.description: Track select screen statistic - Wear rate for the brakes on this track

field.name: stat_downforce_level
field.description: Track select screen statistic - Downforce rate for this track

field.name: swap_for_dummy
field.description: if this track isn't available, mark this checkbox

field.name: top_speed
field.description: In mph

field.name: track_id_dev_string
field.description: Lowercase track name

field.name: track_lights_on
field.description: Should the track lights be on for this route?

field.name: tt_grip
field.description: The scale of the TIS racing line grip in a timetrial session

field.name: tyre_wear_level
field.description: Wear rate for the tyres on this track (Low,Average,High)

field.name: upgrade_high_downforce
field.description: it is a high downforce weekend (see upgrade manager)

field.name: stat_rating
field.description: The available ratings for a statistic

field.name: stat_rating_numeric
field.description: The numeric value for the rating

field.name: wear_level
field.description: Scaling factor

field.name: max_distance
field.description: In miles

field.name: ai_vehicle_type_track
field.description: Reference to a generic car containing reduced mechanics data. All cars should be safe to use this

field.name: average_rain_duration
field.description: How long do showers last - range 0.0 (short sharp) and 1.0 (prolonged potentially whole race).

field.name: initial_cloud_cover_max
field.description: the maximum cloud cover percentage to initialise the simulation with (0.0 - 1.0)

field.name: initial_cloud_cover_min
field.description: the minimum cloud cover percentage to initialise the simulation with (0.0 - 1.0)

field.name: initial_cloud_threat_level_max
field.description: the max. cloud threat percentage to initialise the simulation with (0.0 - 1.0)

field.name: initial_cloud_threat_level_min
field.description: the min. cloud threat percentage to initialise the simulation with (0.0 - 1.0)

field.name: max_air_temperature
field.description: max air temperature in centigrade

field.name: max_humidity
field.description: maximum humidity (%) - range 0.0 - 1.0

field.name: max_windspeed
field.description: max wind speed in m/s.

field.name: min_air_temperature
field.description: min air temperature in centigrade.

field.name: min_humidity
field.description: minimum humidity (%) - range 0.0 - 1.0

field.name: min_windspeed
field.description: min wind speed in m/s

field.name: name
field.description: the name of this setting

field.name: rain_chance
field.description: percentage chance of rain - range 0.0 - 1.0

field.name: rain_max_intensity
field.description: How heavy should the rain get - range 0.0 (light drizzle) to 1.0 (monsoon).

field.name: sun_chance
field.description: percentage chance of sun - range 0.0 - 1.0

field.name: sun_intensity
field.description: How intense a factor is the sun in this geographical location - range 0.0 - 1.0

field.name: database_language_key
field.description: Key string into the language database

field.name: world_record
field.description: The time of the default ghost car, in seconds (nb - at the moment we're using the lap record, not the previous year's fastest lap)

field.name: year
field.description: the year the record was set
